fr.unilim.javance.projet.internal
Interface TodoManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
GTasksTodoManager, MockTodoManager
public interface TodoManager

Todo management interface This interface must be implemented to use a specific backend. In the "Java Avance" teaching unit, you will use real APIs to implement such a backend. From the user interface point of view, you have to use this interface to interact with the backend.

Author:
Amaury Gauthier, David Pequegnot

Method Detail

launchAuthenticationProcess

void launchAuthenticationProcess(Context c)
Launch the authentication process The onAuthenticationRequest method from the listener will be called to give the corresponding Intent if needed.

getAuthenticationStatus

void getAuthenticationStatus()
Get the authentication status The onAuthenticationStatusChanged method from the listener will be called to obtain the current authentication status (true if the user is authenticated, false if not).

getFolder

void getFolder(java.lang.String id)
Get a folder by id Retrieve a folder from a database or a cache using its id. The onGetFolder method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
id - the id of the folder to retrieve

getAllFolders

void getAllFolders()
Get all folders from the database The onGetAllFolder method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

fillFolder

void fillFolder(Folder folder)
Fill or create a new folder If the folder does not exist yet (the Folder instance in parameter has a null or empty identifier), it will be created and uploaded in the remote folder collection. A new folder has just a name (there is no guarantee that initialized Task would be added and/or kept during this process. Then, the task list in the folder will be filled with the correct values. Indeed, by default the folder database contains only references to tasks (for instance a reference by id). To retrieve all Task instances corresponding to a Folder you must use this method. The onFillFolder method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
folder - the folder to fill or create

deleteFolder

void deleteFolder(Folder folder)
Delete the folder given in parameter The folder would be deleted from the database and/or cache. The onDeleteFolder method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
folder - the folder to delete

getTask

void getTask(java.lang.String id)
Get a task from the database by its id The onGetTask method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
id - the id of the task to retrieve

createTask

void createTask(Folder folder,
                Task task)
Create a new task in the specified folder. The onCreateTask method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
folder - the folder in which the task will be added
task - the task to add

updateTask

void updateTask(Task task)
Update a task. The onUpdateTask method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
task - the task with updated values

deleteTask

void deleteTask(java.lang.String id)
Delete a task from the database by its id The onDeleteTask method from the listener will be called at the end of the operation.

Parameters:
id - the id of the Task to delete

registerListener

void registerListener(TodoListener listener)
Register a new listener A listener is called after each operation performed thanks to a TodoManager.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register

removeListener

void removeListener(TodoListener listener)
Remove a listener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove
